revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Ubiquiti Networks |model=airGateway |fcc_date=02/06/2013 |is_manuf=No |type=access point |fcc_id=SWX-AGW |ic_id=6545A-AGW |pwr_v=12-24 |pwr_conn=Ethernet (PoE) |pwr_poe=ns |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9331;AR9331-AL1A; |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q64FVZPIG; |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM6AA160TSB-5G |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9331;AR9331-AL1A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |flags=PoE injector |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=www.ubnt.com |default_ssid_regex=^www.ubnt.com$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=ubnt |default_pass=ubnt |oui=DC:9F:DB |oui_eth=DC:9F:DB }} [http://forum.ubnt.com/showthread.php?t=62319 On the Ubiquiti Networks forum] :[http://blog.wificentrum.com/2012/10/awc-las-vegas-2012-airgateway.html Slides from AWC Las Vegas regarding the device]
This device has a male RJ45 connector (to be connected to an active PoE port), a LAN port, and an active PoE port (which is meant to be connected to an airMAX Gateway)].
There is no '''AirMax''' support for this device. (no extended freq range..)
Default settings are per the FCC quick start guide.
This device is presumed to use a DC:9F:DB ('''Ubiquiti Networks''') per a MAC label on the board in the FCC photos.
